UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Author: Garro AD, Olivella MS, Bombasaro JA, Lima B, Tapia A, Feresin G, Perczel A, Somlai C, Penke B, Cascales JL, Rodríguez AM, Enriz RD

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=10µM),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 32264(MIC=25µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=25µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=25µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Yersinia enterocolitica(MIC=25µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MIC=25µg/ml),Salmonella sp.(MIC=25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>50µM)
